channel.title: [Help]Frugooscape's Server Maker... [Help]
channel.description:
Hello, I am -Nike Extra-
I recently downloaded 'Frugooscape's Server Maker' and I am having some problems.
I went to the configuration screen, and I put my name for admin.
Then when I log in I am not an admin.
I put my name in on all the 'Administrator' files, and it still wont work.
I hope people can help me. I am fairly new to this community, and I will be happy if you relise that.
-Nike Extra-

item.title: [Help]Frugooscape's Server Maker... [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Helly_Melly Helly Melly
item.description:
@Helly_Melly wrote:

-.- 2! lol put it to 3 it makes u admin (owner)

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Frugooscape's Server Maker... [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Nike_Extra -Nike Extra-
item.description:
@Nike_Extra wrote:

Thank you.

Do you know where I can change the coords of haybales and that.

I am wanting to change that because I don’t want it to be like everyone else’s server.

Also, I am wanting to know if there is anyway I can change the “emotes” box and have the ‘Train’ go to different coords.

Thank you again.

-Nike Extra-

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Frugooscape's Server Maker... [Help]
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote="-Nike Extra-, post:4, topic:135463"]I did that, and when I log in, I type and it doesn’t show me with a crown =.

Also, is there any way I can change where the haybales, targets, ect. are?[/quote]

Edit the character file then

Player Rights should equal 2 for admin.

Read full topic

I recently downloaded ‘Frugooscape’s Server Maker’ and I am having some problems.

I went to the configuration screen, and I put my name for admin.

Then when I log in I am not an admin.

I put my name in on all the ‘Administrator’ files, and it still wont work.

I hope people can help me. I am fairly new to this community, and I will be happy if you relise that.

-Nike Extra-[/quote]
Hmm… you probably going to get laughed at after i tell you how.
File>Save
=/
